feed.title: Is it possible for there to be two chains after a hard fork?

entry.title: Is it possible for there to be two chains after a hard fork?
entry.summary: In a discussion about cryptocurrency mining, it was clarified that mining empty blocks is not considered fraud. The speaker had used the term "fraud" in reference to double spending, not mining empty blocks. They explained that mining only empty blocks would be a denial-of-service (DoS) attack rather than double spending.
